Subject: Same tests with varying initialization?
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: Daniel Aborg <daniel.aborg@...>

Hi,

I'm new to JUnit and this mailinglist. I've been trying out JUnit for a
short while and found that it works excellently well, although in the
process of tests and code evolving I often run into the same situation.
Basically, I'll have a TestCase which has a number of test methods and a
common fixture, and after a while it often happens that I want to add an
"additional" fixture against which all the test methods are /also/ run.
Is there any common practice for handling this in the JUnit framework?

Thanks,

Daniel

--
Daniel Aborg  <daniel.aborg@...> 
T: 0207 445 447  M: 07720 29 44 40
subject: Same tests with varying initialization?
